attributes.action: Ask china to stop interfering with the Hong Kong political system
attributes.background:
Recently china has been interfering with the Hong Kong political system 
and under the Sino–British Joint Declaration Agreement China needs to keep out of the Hong Kong political system but china has not been listening to the agreement so can the UK Government please speak to china about this issue

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264610
